venue.address_1: Corner of Rt 66 and Harvestwood Rd.
venue.name: Eckankar Temple of Connecticut

item.description:
In this workshop, presented by Pete and Gloria Brooks, discover how to correct karmic patterns, learn from your past lives, and avoid sowing karmic seeds in your life to find greater love and spiritual freedom.  Try techniques and spiritual exercises to begin a more joyful and fulfilling life. 

     There is a $10 suggested donation.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the large classroom in the downstairs Fellowship Hall after the Worship Service

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Spiritual Wisdom on Karma and Reincarnation Workshop
